text: Afonso Fioreze (1 June 1942 - 6 February 2021) was a Brazilian Roman Catholic bishop. He became a priest in 1970. He was coadjutor bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Luziânia, Brazil in 2003 and 2004 and as bishop of the diocese from 2004 to 2017. Fioreze died on 6 February 2021, aged 78.Diocese of Luziânia ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Brazilian Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Brasília
title: Afonso Fioreze
